## Mouse.dragAndDrop() method

Performs a drag, dragenter, dragover, and drop in sequence.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dragAndDrop(start: Point, target: Point, options?: {
        delay?: number;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | [Point](./puppeteer.point.md) |  |
|  target | [Point](./puppeteer.point.md) | point to drag from |
|  options | { delay?: number; } | An object of options. Accepts delay which, if specified, is the time to wait between <code>dragover</code> and <code>drop</code> in milliseconds. Defaults to 0. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
